reviewText: She makes a lots of sense and easy to use most of her samples.
Very powerful salvation message by my favorite teacher/evangelist. Have given some as gifts.

The word of God is always amazing!
Recommend you all to watch this sermon and read this book so that your live can be transformed.

Praise the Lord!
We got 2 when we ordered this as we wanted one for ourselves (to be able to share it) and one for another couple wheo is seeking and wanting to pass it along.. Very Good for practical purposes.

I just bought 4 of these to give away. You can buy this brand new in Amazon for as little as $6 including shipping. Keep looking until you find the ones listed for about $3.45. They may have been over-stocked or a major retailer cleared out their stock and this will be your lucky find.

This is an excellent sermon / lecture / presentation by Joyce Meyer for people at every level in their walk with Christ. Some of her gems include: "Jesus didn't die so you could have a religion! He died so you could have an intimate relationship with him!" "Just going to church every Sunday doesn't make you a good Christian!"

She gives an excellent message to those who are on the fringes of a new life in Christ, "'Oh but I'd hate to give up drinking and puking in the morning.' A bad day living for God is better than your old good ones living without him!"

She talks to backsliders. She talks to those who aren't seeing their blessings. She talks to those who think they are strict Christians and might be surprised that Jesus won't know them.

You will listen and laugh and be touched. This is an excellent presentation and thank God you can find it in Amazon at a price so low, you will buy extra copies to give away.

Check out her altar call at the end. It is amazing.
